input_text:
Job Title: Team Lead : Full Time

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Customer Service, Marketing

Description:
NEED A SOLID CAREER PATH TO GROW IN?
ARE YOU A MENTOR, ADVOCATE, AND CONSTANTLY WANT TO SPREAD KNOWLEDGE?
IF SO WE WANT YOU TO START COACHING INDIVIDUALS TO GROW OUR TEAM!
Our team is the foundation of this business and is composed of professionals from various backgrounds that have one commonality, they are ENTREPRENEURS AT HEART AND WANT CONTINUOUS GROWTH IN THEIR PROFESSION AND COLLECTIVELY AS A WHOLE.
What We Are Looking For:No experience needed because we give you all the skills. We want to work with knowledge hungry individuals who are confident in their ability to know the traits of the business.You must love mentoring people, as this job requires you to be a people person constantly. You will spend your time making contact and building relationships with team members.Investing in building team members and their performance.High interest in sports and leadership.Professional and have a great student mentality.
Company Highlights:Our team members our very sports minded and competitive in nature, so we have created a unique work atmosphere that fosters results while still maintaining a casual, fun feel environment.We are looking for someone who loves a challenge. Our training program is designed to be an ongoing process with a helpful management team that is invested in the success of each other’s’ performance.Let’s face it, being a leader is hard work that is why we reward our team with fun incentives and team nights.There is a great work/life balance because this is not a “take your work home" type of job. Work hard, play hard mentality.
Requirements:• Excellent verbal/written communication and organizational skills• Passion for inventive and creative projects• Works well with multiple departments and on cross-functional teams• Self-motivated, proactive, positive, results-oriented approach to work
Candidates with the following experience are encouraged to apply today: General Labor, Construction, Home Improvement, Labor, Labor and Development Operations, Field Construction, Telecom Construction, Construction Management or Construction Experience

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Team Lead
output_json.summary: Seeking a Team Lead to coach and mentor individuals to grow the team.
job_responsibilities: High interest in sports and leadership
Maintaining a professional and student-like attitude
output_json.company_information: Sports-minded, competitive work atmosphere fostering results with a casual, fun feel.
